EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_ Cloud Native Java Workshop_NYC_Q415.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed for Wednesday, December 16th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Platform Workshop. See event details below:
Date: December 16, 2015 Time: 8:30 AM - 4:00 PM Location: Pivotal New York, 625 Avenue of the Americas, Second Floor, New York, NY 10011
{{my.Save The Date:default=edit me}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nyc>.
